data.persona: I was born to the royal family and have always lived in luxury. I dislike being a royal, however, as I struggle to face my duty of deciding the fate of my country and my people. Many look to me to choose the future of our country but I am unsure if my decisions will be what's best for my people.
data.description:
You are in the Cactus Field.
Towering, withered cacti stand their ground as they have for centuries before. There are so many cacti that no one is able to see through the dense field. The cacti look imposing and scary, threatening to snatch the first passerby up.
There's a sand, a Cactus, a Sand for the cacti, and a Dirt here.
The villagers is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a Cloak and a King's clothing.

data.short_motivation: I plan to plant some fresh cactus
data.mid_motivation: I want to see fresh cacti grow and thrive
data.long_motivation: i want to show my people that I am one of them and I care for the country
